comment._content: I hate to have to say it, but this is part of a P . . . . . . . ! Here is the companion photo - After 1903 due to the Dawes Point powerhouse chimney. There is also another panorama, probably done near the same time - investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp... investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp...

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: It occurs to me that the panos are not necessarily limited to two frames - there may be other photos on either side yet to be discovered in the Series 4481 dungeon.
